long_description: Offering peace of mind when traveling, the Pacsafe VentureSafe 45L GII Travel Pack features slash-proof wire mesh, puncture-resistant zippers and a locking cable to protect your gear from theft. EXomesh(R), a lightweight stainless-steel wire mesh, is built discreetly into vulnerable areas to prevent thieves from slashing through the fabric. Roobar anti-theft anchor locks zippers and multiple compartments together, and you can lock your luggage to a secure fixture so you don't have to sleep with one eye open. Includes a 3mm stainless-steel cable to use with the Roobar for locking the pack to a secure fixture; storage pouch for the cable is included. Puncture-resistant ToughZip(TM) helps prevent forced entry into your pack with a ball-point pen or other tool, and helps prevent unwanted items placed inside your luggage. Interlocking zipper sliders can take a TSA-approved padlock (sold separately); only 1 padlock required for multiple compartments with the Roobar anchor. Padded shoulder straps, sternum strap and waist belt balance and secure your load; they stow away for protection in transit. Molded foam back support features airflow channels for comfort. Main zippered compartment opens book-style for easy access to clothing and gear, and features an internal zippered mesh pocket. Front zippered compartment features a large zippered pocket that can hold a magazine, tablet or 13 in. laptop; compartment also has 2 smaller zippered mesh pockets. Top and side haul handles and internal and side compression straps help you manage your load. The Pacsafe VentureSafe 45LGII Travel Pack also features a zippered luggage ID pocket, pen holder and key/wallet clip.
short_description: Offering peace of mind when traveling, the Pacsafe VentureSafe 45L GII Travel Pack features slash-proof wire mesh, puncture-resistant zippers and a locking cable to protect your gear from theft.
